item.title: Shortcode highlight
item.description: shortcodes shortcode tweet shortcode vimeo shortcode youtube See the markdown for how this works. Basically wrap the target text in the pair of highlight tags. <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section>
